scenario_text.value:
(Well, we finally made it out of the forest,
but...)

Would you look at that? There’s still no sign
of an amusement park!
I wonder if there’s any neat stuff around?

Okay, listen... I don’t think...I can keep
this up...for much longer.
Saki, you don’t look so good.
Hold on to me, Saki!
I think we really ought to take a break.

Yes, considering that we may still have
a ways to go, a short rest seems unavoidable.
Try telling that to those two.

(Shuuji and Kaito are both pressing on with
no signs of slowing down.)

(I can understand why Kaito would be in
a hurry, but why Shuuji?)
Shuuji, my legs are sore...
Just shut up and keep walking!
Kewww!
Shuuji, it’s no use snapping at him.
Besides, we’re all starting to get tired.
Shuuji, no need to be so harsh.

Yeah, she’s right. Besides, we’re all pretty
wiped out.

Well, I hadn’t planned on resting until we’d
reached the amusement park, but maybe...

(Sounds like even Shuuji’s starting to
waver.)

(Should we stop for a break, or press on?
I would kind of like to look around here...)
(What should I tell Shuuji?)
Let’s take a break.
Let’s press on.
I want to look around.
Let’s take a break.
Yeah, I think we should stop for a rest.
That might be for the best.

Huh? I wasn’t expecting to hear that from
you, Kaito.
Well, just look over there.
Zzz...zzzzzz...
Miyuki? You fell asleep?
Yeah, she’s out like a light.
I guess it’s pretty hard to argue with that.
Uh, yeah...
Let’s press on.

If we stop now, it’ll just make it that much
harder to get going again.

Let’s go a little longer until we get to the
amusement park.
Yeah, that’s what I was thinking.
Wait. No, Takuma, Shuuji.

Lopmon and Saki both look like they’re barely
hanging on.
Can’t you see that?
(It’s true, they do both look pretty bad.)
Sorry. I guess I was asking a bit much.
I want to look around.
Hey, do you mind if I take a look around?
Oh, me too! Me too!
Now? I don’t really see the point.

But how else will we know if there’s anything
dangerous nearby?

Besides, that way maybe the others can stop
and take a break.

Is that why you brought that up? So we could
rest? That’s pretty thoughtful, Takuma.
Yeah, Takuma’s thoughtful all the time!
What’re you bragging about, Agumon?

*sigh* Fine. All right, let’s stop for a
break.

Fortunately, there doesn’t seem to be any
sign of that fog nearby.
Yeah! I don’t sense anything scary like that!
No complaints, Kaito?
Nah.
Finally! I’m so tired...
Saki, are you all right?

Miyuki, Haru, would you like to rest here
with us too?
Sure...
Oh, did that wake her up?
Nah, she’s still walking with her eyes closed.
Guess we really wore them out.

It was perhaps too harsh a journey for two so
young.

Maybe, but it’s not like we could’ve left
them behind.

Speaking of harsh, there’s someone else I’m
worried about, too.
You mean Lopmon?

Um... I’m sorry, Shuuji. I wound up slowing
you down again.

Just shut up and get some rest. We won’t be
stopping again until we get to the park.
Okay...

(Man, sounds like he’s still gonna have it
rough between here and the amusement park.)
(But anyway, I’d better get some rest.)
